properties.Name: Battery

Columns.Name: BatteryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a battery.

Columns.Name: ManufacturedByPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: SerialNumber
Columns.Description: The serial number of the battery.

Columns.Name: ActivatedShelfLifeMonths
Columns.Description: The activated shelf life of the battery in months.

Columns.Name: BatteryCapacityAmpereHours
Columns.Description: battery capacity - The maximum total electrical charge, expressed in ampere-hours, which a battery can deliver to a load under a specific set of conditions.

Columns.Name: ChargeFactorHours
Columns.Description: A number representing the time in hours during which a battery can be charged at a constant current without damage to the battery. Usually expressed in relation to the total battery capacity, i.e., C/5 indicates a charge factor of 5 hours.

Columns.Name: DeepCycleBatteryIndicator
Columns.Description: A battery with large plates that can withstand many discharges to a low state-of-charge.

Columns.Name: MaintenanceFreeBatteryIndicator
Columns.Description: A sealed battery to which water cannot be added to maintain electrolyte level.

Columns.Name: BatteryTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a battery type.

Columns.Name: SolarPanelId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Component.

Columns.Name: ChargeControllerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a charge controller.
